about_the_game:
The only post office in a small village in the mountains, the main character of this story, Brass, works here. His job is to deliver letters and packages to the local people.

One day, Brass receives a letter from his grandmother who lives in a town by the sea, and a new adventure begins.

A Peaceful, Cozy Adventure Game

The story progresses through conversations with the villagers and errands.

There is no combat or intense action in this game. Please enjoy it in a relaxed atmosphere.

A Little Mystery

As you progress through the game, there are a few mysteries that call forth more mysteries. (Exaggerated?)

What is the secret behind his father's death?

A cursed forest?

A secret underground facility?

Calm Background Music

The game features music by four composers: Tomás Palazzi, Svyatoslav Petrov, Josh Kashdan and Kyle Booth. All of the music was written exclusively for this game.

Please play the demo version and listen to the music for yourself. All of the tracks are gentle and wonderful, and you'll want to listen to them over and over again.

Unique Characters and Animals

The main character, Brass, is a 14-year-old boy who has started working at the post office to help support his family.

You'll also meet many other characters.

Scenery

The story takes place in a mountain village and a seaside town. Brass runs around in the cute isometric-ish sceneries.

name: Brass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: As the player, you take on the role of Brass, delivering letters and packages while interacting with the villagers. One day, a letter from his grandma sets Brass off on a new adventure. With relaxing, story-driven gameplay and adorable low-poly art, Brass offers a cozy and heartwarming experience.
